= Sound =

== Sound Waves In Air ==

== Intensity of Sound ==

*Intensity in dB*
{{$
\mathrm{dB} = (\mathrm{10\,dB}) \times \mathrm{log}_{10}\left(\frac{\mathrm{W \cdot m^{-2}}}{1\times10^{-12}\mathrm{W \cdot m^{ -2 }}}\right)
}}$

{{$
I \propto \frac{1}{r^2}
}}$

{{$
\frac{I_1}{I_2} = \frac{r_1^2}{r_2^2}
}}$

== The Speed of Sound ==

{{$
v \approx 331\,\mathrm{m \cdot s^{-1}}
}}$

== The Doppler Effect ==

{{$
f = f_0\left(\frac{v+v_r}{v+v_s}\right)
}}$
Where $v$ is the speed of waves in the medium, $f$ is the observed frequency, $f_0$ is the emitted frequency,
$v_r$ is the velocity of the receiver relative to the medium and $v_s$ is the speed of the source relative to the medium.
